thread.title: Mike Lewis
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Mike Lewis

author: Mike Lewis
title: Mike Lewis
text: I ordered the roses for a special occasion. They were delivered as promised on the due date. However, as one would expect, they arrived really as large buds but all failed to open over a 7 day period after which they were visably deteriorating and dissappointed my partner immensly. my contact with the company resulted in an offer of a 5Â£ voucher for my next order. however, it would be pointless of me to order again as i would actually like the roses i send to open before they perish.
